Title: Soft Keyboard for Windows 8 also known as a Virtual Keyboard for Windows 8
Description: This is a soft keyboard for Windows 8 (also known as a virtual keyboard). It looks just like the default Windows 8 Soft Keyboard, but you can control it!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a soft keyboard for Windows 8 (also known as a virtual keyboard for Windows 8).  It is taken from an existing sample from Microsoft and was modified to look like the Windows 8 Soft Keyboard.

It is also only 3 rows high or 4 rows high. Give it a whirl and let me know what you think.
